duties_responsibilities.duty: Support Faculty Investigators examining cognitive outcomes related to treatment for childhood catastrophic diseases.
Coordinate data across multiple disciplines and collaborating sites.
Evaluate interventions addressing cognitive outcomes related to treatment for childhood catastrophic diseases.
Conduct cognitive testing using typical batteries for testing measures of intelligence, attention, memory, and parent report measures.
Analyze cognitive outcomes related to brain tumor, leukemia, and sickle cell disease treatments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related biomedical/bio-behavioral field required, Master’s degree preferred
